description:
Sept 13-14: Chinook to Anderson closure

The Red Line will be closed between Chinook and Anderson stations starting Saturday, September 13 until the very early hours of Monday, September 15.

Red Line trains coming from the south will terminate at Anderson Station, and trains from the northwest and downtown will terminate at Chinook Station. For travel between Chinook and Anderson Stations, we'll have shuttle buses replacing train service.

Full CTrain service will be back up and running again on Monday, September 15.

For more information, please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
